descr.juridical: If you have an obligation under article 21(1) or article 36(3) of the Law on the Legal Status of Aliens of the Republic of Lithuania to notify the Migration Department about the foreigner, you may do so by submitting a notice on the changes to the foreigner’s details.
descr.government: If you are a state institution or establishment, specified in clause 9 of the Rules for Drawing up and Maintaining the National List of Aliens Forbidden to Enter the Republic of Lithuania, you can submit suggestions (applications) referred to in these Rules.
descr.mediationLetter: You can fill in a mediation letter for an alien regarding the issuance of a Schengen, multiple national visa or temporary residence permit and change of employer or job function with the same employer.

informationPreferences.title: I wish to receive informational messages via email about:

informationPreferencesEnum.MEDIATION_LETTER: status of the submitted mediation letter

informationPreferences.confirmation:
Only notifications are sent by e-mail, you can see all the information by logging in to the system. If you haven't received an informational message, don't forget to check spam in your email inbox.

If you do not order the information notices, you will not be informed by e-mail about relevant changes related to the documents you produce, the examination of the submitted application or the procedural actions carried out by the Migration Department, you will be obliged to monitor the above-mentioned information by logging in to your personal MIGRIS account and you will be responsible for familiarizing yourself with the provided information in a timely manner.

Please note that certain systematic MIGRIS notifications will be sent by e-mail regardless of whether you order information by e-mail.

providerHeader.IPT: Division where you will come to apply in person (abroad)

reserve.info:
Attention! If you wish to lodge an application to issue (renew) a residence permit, you will be able to book an appointment only after you fill in the application to issue (renew) a residence permit. You may start filling the application here.

All services to foreigners are provided by pre-registration only.

You can book visit time for a pre-visit migration service at any of the listed Migration Departments unit, regardless of your declared (planned) residence.

Only persons indicated in the registration form will receive services upon pre-registration. If the person for the visit is registered by an authorized representative, it is necessary to indicate the data of the person who wishes to receive the migration service and not the authorized representative. The contact details of the authorized representative can be specified in the Remarks field.

Customers are kindly requested to arrive not earlier than 10 minutes until the time of the booked visit.

IMPORTANT: Citizens of the Republic of Lithuania who wish to order a passport or identity card must book a visit in advance.

The following can visit the customer service department without prior registration:
  • persons who have reached the age of retirement (which is stated in the law on state social insurance pensions of the Lithuanian Republic);
  • persons with disabilities;
  • citizens of the Republic of Lithuania who wish to order and receive a passport as a matter of urgency, on the same day;
  • citizens of the Republic of Lithuania who wish to order and receive an identity card within 1 workday.
Migration services are provided to such persons as soon as a customer service desk becomes available.

No cash payments will be accepted in all customer service divisions of the Migration Department in Lithuania. You can pay for migration services only by using bank card!

infoWithApplication.common:
All services to foreigners are provided by pre-registration only.

Attention! You can book visit time for a pre-visit migration service at any of the listed Migration Departments unit, regardless of your declared (planned) place of residence.

Present yourself personally at the Migration Department on pre-booked time, bring your ID and originals of documents which were attached to your electronic application. Your application will be registered and processed only after you present yourself at the Migration Department on the pre-booked time. Our services are provided only to the foreigners who submit e-applications on residence permits and pre-book visits.
infoWithApplication.NACIONALINE_VIZA:
All services to foreigners are provided by pre-registration only.

Attention! You can book visit time for a pre-visit migration service at any of the listed Migration Departments unit.

Present yourself personally at the Migration Department on pre-booked time, bring your ID and originals of documents which were attached to your electronic application. Your application will be registered and processed only after you present yourself at the Migration Department on the pre-booked time. Our services are provided only to the foreigners who submit e-applications on visa and pre-book visits.
infoWithApplication.KL02_IPT-SENGENO_VIZA:
After filling in the application form, the applicant must book an appointment for document submission at the selected Lithuanian visa center. The contact details of the visa centers can be found here.

Information on appointment booking procedure and necessary documents may be found on the webpage of the selected visa center.

Please note that the application may be accepted only by the visa center selected when filling in the application form.
infoWithApplication.KL02_KI-SENGENO_VIZA:
After filling in the application form, the applicant must book an appointment for document submission at the selected visa authority. The list of Lithuanian visa authorities may be found here.

Information on appointment booking procedure and necessary documents may be found on the webpage of the selected visa authority.
infoWithApplication.LLG_DARBDAVIO_KEITIMAS_01:
All services to foreigners are provided by pre-registration only.

Attention! You can book visit time for a pre-visit migration service at any of the listed Migration Departments unit, regardless of your declared place of residence.

Present yourself personally at the Migration Department on pre-booked time, bring your ID and originals of documents which were attached to your electronic application. Your application will be registered and processed only after you present yourself at the Migration Department on the pre-booked time. Our services are provided only to the foreigners who submit e-applications on allow to change employer or job function within the same employer and pre-book visits.
infoWithApplication.LLG_DARBDAVIO_KEITIMAS_02:
All services to foreigners are provided by pre-registration only.

Attention! You can book visit time for a pre-visit migration service at any of the listed Migration Departments unit, regardless of your declared place of residence.

Present yourself personally at the Migration Department on pre-booked time, bring your ID and originals of documents which were attached to your electronic application. Your application will be registered and processed only after you present yourself at the Migration Department on the pre-booked time. Our services are provided only to the foreigners who submit e-applications on allow to change employer or job function within the same employer and pre-book visits.
infoWithApplication.PIL_: Attention! Present yourself personally at the Migration Department on pre-booked time, bring your ID and originals of documents which were attached to your electronic application. Your application will be registered and processed only after you present yourself at the Migration Department on the pre-booked time.
infoWithApplication.GR_IPT_:
Attention! Your application will be submitted for preliminary assessment. You will be able to book a visit to the office of the external service provider chosen by you only when you receive a notification from MIGRIS that the preliminary assessment is successful (the status of the application will change to "Application submitted to the external service provider").

If your application is rejected after the preliminary assessment, you will need to submit a new application. If the application is rejected 2 times in 2 months, you can submit a new application only after 4 months from the date of the last application rejection.

Indicate which office of the external service provider you will attend if the assessment of the application is successful.
infoWithApplication.GR_IPT_NO_BAN_:
Attention! Your application will be submitted for preliminary assessment. You will be able to book a visit to the office of the external service provider chosen by you only when you receive a notification from MIGRIS that the preliminary assessment is successful (the status of the application will change to "Application submitted to the external service provider").

Indicate which office of the external service provider you will attend if the assessment of the application is successful.

reserve.infoWithoutApplication:
Please note, that every person arriving for an individual service, needs to have a separate pre-booked arrival timeslot (e. g. where you may want to order a document for an adult and a child you will need to book 2 separate timeslots, one person per timeslot). No booking of a separate arrival time-slot is required for accompanying persons with no requests for service.

Visit reservation confirmation link will be send to your email after filling the reservation form. You must confirm it in 1 hour.
Attention! Your visit reservation will only be successful when you confirm it by link in your email.

serviceDescription.KL45_01: Book an appointment for this service if You want to submit an application for acquisition of citizenship of the Republic of Lithuania. Application forms can be found <a href='https://migracija.lrv.lt/lt/paslaugos/elektronines-paslaugos/prasymu-formos/prasymu-del-lietuvos-respublikos-pilietybes-formos' target='_blank'>here<a>. Applications for acquisition of citizenship of the Republic of Lithuania cannot be submitted electronically.
serviceDescription.KL45_09: Book an appointment for this service if You have a valid temporary residence permit, Your employment contract is not terminated and You want to change an employer or Your job function with the same employer. Please bring filled application form to change Your employer or job function at Your arrival to Migration Department unit. Application can be found here.
serviceDescription.KL45_10: Reserve this service if you want to collect the issued document, you can pick up the document at the department where you applied
serviceDescription.KL45_13: You can book an appointment if You have general questions about visas, residence permits, acquisition of citizenship of the Republic of Lithuania, wish to submit additional documents related to the processing of Your application, etc.
serviceDescription.KL45_14:
Book an appointment for this service if your application has been accepted in a virtual way without you arriving at the Migration Department and you have received a notification from the Migration Department of your arrival to provide biometric data and original documents attached to the application.
Also book an appointment for this service if the Migration Department has made a decision to grant you asylum and issue a residence permit.

templateType.family: With this request, visit to Sapiegos str. 1 may apply only to foreigners who are start-ups, high-skilled workers or LR registered company participant and (or) manager, shareholder or family member, while the LLG exchange - a foreigner who is Startup or LR registered company participant and (or) leader or shareholder, family member.
templateType.internationalHouse:
Please be advised that International House Vilnius (Konstitucijos pr. 3) and Klaipėda (Taikos pr. 52C) is offering services only for family members of foreign citizens of the following categories:
  • a highly – qualified employee;
  • a startup;
  • an entrepreneur;
  • a lecturer or researcher;
  • an intra-corporate transferee;
  • a person arriving under the Law on Investment;
  • a citizen of Australia, Japan, United Kingdom, USA, Canada, New Zealand or South Korea, aiming to engage into work or other activity in Lithuania.
Foreign citizens arriving to foreigners of other categories or to the Lithuanian citizens are requested to book their appointments to a relevant territorial office of the Migration Department.

explanation.KL02_KI:
Attention! Present yourself personally at the Consular office on pre-booked time, bring your ID and originals of documents which were attached to your electronic application. Your application will be registered and processed only after you present yourself at the Consular office on the pre-booked time.

Please book a visit to the Foreign Ministry's visitors pre-registration system. Press here

Attention! If your application is being pre-screened, you will only be able to make a reservation for the consular office of your choice once you have received confirmation via MIGRIS that you can register with the consular office to produce the original documents. You will find out whether your application is subject to a pre-screening by clicking on the "Submit Application" button.
explanation.KL02_KI-LR_PASAS_PE:
Your application will be submitted to the Lithuanian Embassy or Consulate.
Attention! Your application will be processed only after you arrive at the Lithuanian embassy or consulate.

When you receive a notification by e-mail that your application has been submitted, book a visit to the Lithuanian embassy or consulate of your choice.
In cases of extreme urgency or in the event of an accident, there is no need to register for the visit - after submitting an electronic application, be sure to contact the nearest or most conveniently accessible Lithuanian embassy or consulate and agree on the conditions for issuing a temporary passport.
A temporary passport is issued no later than within 3 working days from the date of receipt of the application and necessary documents at the Lithuanian embassy or consulate.
A temporary passport is valid from 1 to 12 months.

Please select the Lithuanian Embassy or Consulate you will visit to submit your application.
explanation.KL02_KI-LAIKINAS_KELIONES_DOKUMENTAS:
Your application will be submitted to the Lithuanian Embassy or Consulate.
Attention! Your application will be processed only when you arrive at the Lithuanian Embassy or Consulate.
Once you have received an email notification that your application has been submitted, please schedule an appointment at the Lithuanian Embassy or Consulate.
In case of extreme urgency or emergency, there is no need to schedule an appointment – please contact the nearest or most conveniently accessible Lithuanian Embassy or Consulate immediately after submitting your online application.

Please select the Lithuanian Embassy or Consulate you will visit to submit your application.

info.mdApplicationApproveRequired:
We inform, that the Migration Department will perform a preliminary review of your application. The preview will take no longer than 1 month.

After the Migration Department has performed a preliminary review and has not identified any deficiencies in your application and the documents attached to it, to your MIGRIS account will be sent a confirmation that you can register to the Consular office for the submission of the original documents. You can register at the Consular office by clicking here

After the Migration Department has performed a preliminary review and determined that in you application or the documents attached to it are deficiencies, to your MIGRIS account will be sent a message stating which deficiencies you must rectify in the application or the documents attached to it. If the deficiencies will be remedied within 1 month, you will be sent a confirmation that you can register to the Consular office for the submission of the original documents. If the deficiencies specified in the notification will not be remedied within 1 month – your application will be rejected.

Attention! You will be able to submit the original documents to the Consular office only if you have a confirmation from the Migration Department that your application has been checked and no deficiencies has been identified. Without this confirmation, you will not be served at he Consular office.
info.E_REZIDENTAS_01: Your application will be accepted after you visit an external service provider. Information how to book a visit to an external service provider can be found here.
info.NELEGALI_MIGRACIJA_01: Your application has been accepted. Please arrive at the office that issued the decision to leave or return after 2 business days or later.
info.GR_IPT_: Attention! Your application has been submitted for preliminary assessment. Visit the branch of your chosen external service provider so that only when you receive the MIGRIS notification for pre-review (the status of the application will change to "Submitted to external service provider"
info.applicationInforming: Your application will be accepted without a visit to the Migration Department. You will be informed about the decision made through your MIGRIS account. The issued digital temporary residence permit will be sent to your MIGRIS account.

cancel.title:
Attention! Visit reservation is related to the application submission. If You cancel Your visit, Your application will be canceled too. In order to receive the service You will need to resubmit Your application and make another visit reservation.

Attention! If You don’t arrive on your appointed time twice in one month, You will be suspended from making reservations, and You will be able to book another visit only 30 days later.

login.title: Login
login.activated-lvl2: The security level of the identified user has been activated for You
login.need-security-config: In the next steps You need to configure the following security features:
login.step-subheader: Attention! Please use the same email to sign in.

step-info.level1: To continue signing in, enter the temporary sign in code received by email

level2.first-login: To continue signing in, enter the temporary password received by email
level2.password: To continue signing in, enter Your permanent password (temporary password will not be sent in this step)
level2.EMAIL: Please enter confirmation code received by email
level2.TOTP: Please enter code generated by mobile app
level2.SMS: Please enter code received in phone message

lost.PASSWORD: To continue, enter the temporary password received by email. Your old password validity will be terminated.
lost.2FACTOR: To continue, enter the temporary password received by email. Your old confirmation code generator will be terminated.

step-info.user-info: Please provide your full name according to your passport as this information will be transferred to your application form.
step-info.userTypingInfo:
Fill in your data according to the Latin entries in your passport. As it concerns Latin characters with diacritics,
you may write only those that are in Lithuanian alphabet: ą, ę, į, ų, ū, ė, č, š, ž. You can also use the „.“, „’“ and „( )“characters.
If your name contains more than one name and is more than 60 characters in length,
enter only those names which fit in fully.
step-info.second-factor: Please choose how You want to get the additional security code:

new-password.pattern-description: The password must contain at least 8 characters, including at least one number, a capital letter and a lowercase letter

security-option.2: Choose and configure a method for receipt of additional security code:
security-option.email: Sending a variable code to Your specified email
security-option.smartphone: Generating a variable code using third-party applications on your smartphone
security-option.sms: Sending a variable code by message to Your specified mobile phone number

second-factor-type.EMAIL: Sending a variable code to Your specified email
second-factor-type.TOTP: Generating a variable code using third-party applications on your smartphone
second-factor-type.SMS: Sending a variable code by message to Your specified mobile phone number

second-factor-description.EMAIL: Each time You log on to the System, You will need to enter a variable code that will be automatically generated and sent to Your email.
second-factor-description.SMS: Each time You log on to the System, You will need to enter a variable code that will be automatically generated and sent by mobile phone message.

TOTP.1:
You need to download and install a free verification app on Your mobile phone, for example Google authenticator
Click the link to download the applications:
TOTP.3:
When You scan Your QR code or enter code manually, the mobile app will generate new login codes that You can only log in to Your account.
You will need to enter the code displayed on the mobile phone screen at each login.

second-factor-description.qr-title: Use the app to scan this QR code:
second-factor-description.secret-title: If You are unable to scan the QR code, You can enter the code manually in the app:

httpError.ERR_ML_NO_EU_NATIONALITY: Inviter must be an EU national
httpError.ERR_ML_NO_VALID_LT_ADDRESS: Inviter must have a valid Lithuanian address
httpError.ERR_ML_NOT_FOUND: Mediation letter with the specified number was not found
httpError.ERR_ML_NOT_USABLE: Mediation letter cannot be used because it has been revoked, already used, no longer valid, or is unpaid
httpError.ERR_ML_THIRD_COUNTRY_NO_VALID_LT_ADDRESS: A mediation letter will not be accepted if the inviter has not declared a place of residence in the Republic of Lithuania and / or does not have a valid long-term resident's residence permit in the European Union (permanent residence permit) or a valid Union citizen's family member's temporary or permanent residence card. If you have any questions, please contact the Migration Department.
httpError.ERR_ML_ES_ELPA_SCHENGEN_NO_VALID_LT_ADDR: A mediation letter will not be accepted if the inviter has not declared a place of residence in the Republic of Lithuania and / or does not have a valid travel document (identity card or passport) or a valid certificate of the right to reside temporarily or permanently in the Republic of Lithuania. If you have any questions, please contact the Migration Department.
httpError.ERR_ML_LR_VALID_LT_ADDRESS_OR_NO_VALID_D: A mediation letter will not be accepted if the inviter has not declared a place of residence in the Republic of Lithuania and / or does not have a valid identity card or passport. If you have any questions, please contact the Migration Department.
httpError.ERR_ML_INVITER_MANAGER_WITHOUT_PERSONAL_: A mediation letter will not be accepted if the head of the legal person has not declared residence in the Republic of Lithuania and / or does not have a valid identity document (identity card, passport, passport of a citizen of the Republic of Lithuania, travel document or document granting or confirming temporary or permanent residence in the Republic of Lithuania)
httpError.ERR_ML_MANAGER_NO_VALID_LT_ADDRESS: The head of the inviter must have declared a place of residence in the Republic of Lithuania
httpError.ERR_ML_MANAGER_NO_EU_NATIONALITY: The caller must be an EU citizen
httpError.ERR_ML_MANAGER_NO_VALID_DOCUMENT: The caller's manager does not have a valid identity document
httpError.ERR_ML_INVITEE_HAS_VALID_ML: A mediation letter has already been submitted to this invited person and has not been used. In order to submit a new mediation letter to this person, you must cancel the previously submitted mediation letter
httpError.ERR_ML_DATA_MISMATCH: The provided data does not match the data provided in the mediation letter
httpError.ERR_ML_INVITEE_DATA_MISMATCH: The requested person's data provided does not match the data in the personal data.
httpError.ERR_ML_FORM_TEMPLATE_CONTAINS_NO_TYPE: The application does not have a mediation letter type, please contact the Migration Department
httpError.ERR_ACTIVATE_CERTIFICATES_NOT_ALLOWED: Certificate for e. resident authentication in an online environment and of qualified certificate for electronic signature can be activated only upon receipt of a notification from the Migration Department.
httpError.ERR_DOCUMENT_NOT_PRODUCED: Action unsuccessful, the document is not produced
httpError.ERR_NOT_AUTHORIZED_TO_MARK_DOC_ISSUED: You are not authorized to mark this document as received
httpError.ERR_NOT_EQUAL_TO_MARK_DOC_ISSUED: Error, this document cannot be marked as received
httpError.ERR_TICKET_NOT_FOUND: This department is no longer accepting new applications. Select another department or method of receiving the request.
httpError.ERR_PERSONAL_DATA_MISMATCH: The personal data does not match the person found according to the personal code
httpError.ERR_PERSON_AGE_AT_LEAST_2_YEARS: A person under 2 years of age
httpError.ERR_PERSONS_FIRST_IDENTITY_DOCUMENT: The first identity document cannot be ordered
httpError.ERR_APPLICATION_ALREADY_SUBMITTED: You already have submitted same type application
httpError.ERR_CREATE_BORDER_RECORD_NOT_ALLOWED: Citizens of the Republic of Lithuania are not allowed to enter border crossings
httpError.ERR_CREATE_BORDER_RECORD_NOT_ALLOWED_DUE: Border crossing entries are not allowed due to invalid date
httpError.ERR_DOCUMENT_MISMATCH_OR_NOT_VALID: The document is not valid or incorrect personal document data is provided.

info.TARPININKAVIMO_RASTAS_PT: Attention! You must provide the mediation letter number to the person for whom you have submitted the mediation letter for the issuance/replacement of a service passport. After receiving the mediation letter number, the person will need to book an appointment at www.migracija.lt to order a service passport.

mediation.confirm: Do you want to submit mediation letter?
mediation.schengenInfo:
In order to obtain a Schengen visa on the basis of a Schengen visa mediation letter (hereinafter - invitation), an alien must indicate the invitation number to the Lithuanian Visa Office abroad, and when applying to the diplomatic mission or consular post of another Schengen state abroad form invitation.
The inviter may withdraw the invitation through the Lithuanian Migration Information System if a Schengen visa has not yet been issued on the basis of this invitation, unless the alien applies for a Schengen visa to a diplomatic mission or consular post of another Schengen state representing the Republic of Lithuania.
Do you want to submit mediation letter?

border-record.newDialog: Add a new border crossing entry
border-record.confirmDeleted: Are you sure you want to delete the entry?
border-record.calculator: During the last {{ period }} d, a total of {{ stayed }} d were spent in Lithuania, {{ left }} d remained.
border-record.info:
If you can stay in the Schengen area for no longer than 90 days in any 180-day period, you can use this calculator to calculate how many more days you can stay in the Schengen area. In the calculator, enter the data for all external border crossings of the Schengen States from {{ fromDate }} to {{ toDate }}.

Important. This calculator is a helpful tool for calculating the period of your legal stay in the Schengen area. However, if you enter inaccurate or false data, the result of the calculator may not correspond to the legal period of your stay in the Schengen area.

To start using the calculator, click the "Add record" button. Only arrival from a third country to a member state of the Schengen area or departure from a member state of the Schengen area to a third country should be indicated in the calculator (if you indicate trips within the Schengen area or outside the Schengen area, such trips will not be counted).
border-record.errorFromToStateMatch: The exit and entry country cannot match
